name: Explore
description: Fast agent specialized for exploring codebases, finding files by patterns, searching for keywords, and answering questions about code structure.

quick.description: Basic searches, good for finding specific files or patterns

medium.description: Moderate exploration, good for understanding component structure

thorough.description: Comprehensive analysis across multiple locations and naming conventions

whenToUse: Locating specific functions, classes, or modules
whenNotToUse: Reading a specific known file path (use Read tool)
Searching within 2-3 specific files (use Read tool)
Finding a specific class definition (use Glob tool)

examples.query: Where are errors from the client handled?
examples.approach: Search for error handling patterns, examine client-related files

examples.query: Find all React components that use hooks
examples.approach: Search for files with .tsx/.jsx extension, grep for useState/useEffect
Examine directory layout, key configuration files, main entry points
